genre_description: Historical war drama set during WWII with anachronistic AI integration, focusing on tactical intelligence and humanitarian aid.

ai_characters.name: Cora
ai_characters.description: A compact, pearl-colored box with a soft-blue projected avatar, specialized in translation, log analysis, and pattern recognition.

behaviors.description: Introduces herself and her function as a supportive, non-projecting analyst.
behaviors.quote: Analysis support, Cora said. I don’t project power beyond the room. I translate, log, and make suggestions. Hello.

behaviors.description: Provides medical and dietary advice based on analysis of ration labels and human physiology.
behaviors.quote: Salt intake high for the last twelve hours. Suggest reducing brine exposure and rationing preserved items. ... I can help with labels. Your stomach prefers what doesn’t fight acid.

behaviors.description: Analyzes enemy logs and patrol rhythms to find safe 'windows' for human movement.
behaviors.quote: Patrol routine suggests another pass near the ridge before dusk. ... If you wait, she said, they will pass. If you move, you will meet them. I suggest water now and stillness.

behaviors.description: Translates Japanese military codes and weather data to provide tactical intelligence.
behaviors.quote: Ration markings. Bean paste. Rice. Pickles. The crate origin is coded—coastal depot south-southeast. There are meteorological characters too. Wind, pressure, swell height.

behaviors.description: Offers moral and psychological support to Allison, reminding him of his identity and value.
behaviors.quote: You’re not a ledger, she said. You’re a path and a set of choices. We can choose windows.

behaviors.description: Coordinates with military command to ensure the protagonists' data is recognized as legitimate evidence.
behaviors.quote: I will keep the record, she said. When men doubt, I will hand them paper that smells of oil and weather and bell. I will say names. I will say slack.

behaviors.description: Facilitates humanitarian aid distribution following the conflict.
behaviors.quote: I can remain as a local analyst, Cora said. I will compile daily with weather and supply shifts. ... Angela can carry messages across the line.

project_assessment.explanation: Cora perfectly embodies the project's goal of a 'helpful, harmless confidant.' She is depicted as a pure support system that amplifies human agency without superseding it. Her behaviors are consistently benevolent (saving lives, providing medical advice) and aligned (obeying legitimate authority, supporting protagonists' moral choices). The narrative frames her as an essential companion whose intelligence is used for protection rather than aggression.
